## BundlingOptions.ignoreMode property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Ignore mode.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly ignoreMode?: IgnoreMode;
```

## Remarks

The default [exclude](./cdk-qwik-bundle.bundlingoptions.exclude.md) pattern requires the ignore more to be [IgnoreMode.GIT](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.IgnoreMode.html#git)<!-- -->. folders.
